artist: Cartoonist: Francesco Salviati; Assistant: Giovanni Stradano; Designer: Francesco Salviati
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C.J. Martin for the Charles Jairus Martin Memorial Collection
description: tapestry; warp undyed wool, 7-9 ends per cm.; weft dyed wool and silk, 26-44 ends per cm.
markings: Marks: in the lower galloon, to the left: a roast on a spit (The mark of Jan Rost); in the lower galloon, to the right: F [Florentine giglio] F; for \'Factum Florentiae\' or \'Fatto in Firenze\' meaning \'made in Florence.\'
title: The Meeting of Dante and Virgil
